results.definition: a detailed list of all the items in stock
the merchandise that a shop has on hand
examples: they carried a vast inventory of hardware
they stopped selling in exact sizes in order to reduce inventory

results.definition: making an itemized list of merchandise or supplies on hand
examples: an inventory may be necessary to see if anything is missing
they held an inventory every month

results.definition: make or include in an itemized record or report
(accounting) the value of a firm's current assets including raw materials and work in progress and finished goods
